::KitKat::

She turned and looked at Bludgeon. "Your right of course. I was way 
too easy.  But then again, I'm looking at his head. That head is dead 
and so is the body that was attatched to that head. But then again.." 
She had the nagging feeling that Megatro would return to haunt 
them.  "OK then, let's get his head and body and take it for study.  
We might out that I just got lucky, or that the matrix is playing 
tricks on me." She grabbed at her side as the pain shot through her. 
She groaned slightly.  "But for now, we need to get a base up and 
running. We can try to clear out our old cave or go scouting for a 
new one? Any ideas?"
For a pred leader, she knew her one weakness was that she like to 
function as a group and not as separate bots, but more like one 
functioning unit. But then again, it got her this far.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Bludgeon:::
> 
> Bludgeon: Id hate to crash the party, but, Kit Kats right. That was 
too easy. 
>  I've known a lot of Leaders in my time, and none of them died that 
easy.  I 
> may be wrong though... all im saying is that we shouldnt right him 
off that 
> easily.  But what ever you say.
> ::He transforms to beast mode and follows::
